title: new tab in address bar with "+" missing
content: I really miss the "+" [plus sign] in the address bar to add new tab, what happened to it?
creator: jagman55

title: Persistent desktop notifications, related to Firefox Relay?
content:
I have my desktop set up to receive notifications from my phone, but today the typical notifications appearance and behavior have changed.

I'm getting a bunch of notifications at once, some have the look I expect, while others look different, the ones with white backgrounds are white and they stacked themselves vertically, one above the other, until they are off screen, until I delete the ones I can see, so they will be revealed.

I just had about six or seven arrive at once, and they froze my desktop. The only things I had access to with the mouse was the reminders, and the only way to free things up was to delete the reminders, one by one.

Some of them come from google assistant reminders I have set, the ones that are twice as big and have a white background. The others are from Firefox, some of which are from Gmail. They look more like the ones I usually get, but I do not have Gmail set to send email notifications, and they are the ones that caused the freezing.

I just recently added Firefox Relay. Could that be responsible?

Here are some examples: Please notice that image with two different looking notifications, but both from he same app:
creator: noel_envoide

title: Changed namerserver on my site, but firefox still thinks site is on the old nameserver
content:
I have recently updated my site to run off a different hosting provider, and CloudFlare, a long needed change to my site. However, in doing so, my site has become unreachable on my laptop, with firefox (and other browsers) still thinking that my domain is attached to the old nameservers, causing it to redirect to the "site not found" page of my previous hosting provider. I have tried flushing my system's DNS cache, clearing my browser cache, clearing the browser's DNS records, all to no avail, however, I do know my site works, as on my mobile phone with basic Safari, the site works fine.

my system is on Ubuntu 22.04, and running firefox version 107.0
creator: liamz2r

title: Hovering mouse over profile in chooser shows profile location makes unresponsive to mouse
content: Tell me how to configure profile chooser to not show profile location when mouse hovers over it for 2 seconds, make the time necessary to show profile location 10 seconds, or disable the showing of profile location when hovering over profile in chooser.

title: Web site issues
content:
I get this when I attempt to go to https://www.crutchfield.com I have cleared cached data. Turned off the firewall and vpn. Any help would be great.

Secure Connection Failed

An error occurred during a connection to www.crutchfield.com. PR_CONNECT_RESET_ERROR 

   The page you are trying to view cannot be shown because the authenticity of the received data could not be verified.    Please contact the website owners to inform them of this problem.
creator: Drewfox

title: No support
content: Firefox and Malwarebytes are not compatible since recent updates. Nobody here seems to be able to help and I am forced to use a different browser to view YouTube videos. I have been in touch with Malwarebytes. I thought the issue was resolved but it not working again. How can a product be developed without anyone who knows what they are doing to provide support?
creator: lbertrand

title: lost user names and passwords
content: A prompt on Firefox said that I had not refreshed my browser for a while and if I do it my passwords would be safe. But after I refresh Firefox, all my saved user names and passwords were gone?
creator: chchen7y
